Context:
George Brown College has been named one of Greater Toronto's Top Employers for 2023 for the seventh consecutive year. The college was recognized for its investment in staff development through a professional development leave policy, which encourages creativity and self-care. The Top Employers list is based on eight criteria including physical workplace, work atmosphere, benefits, vacation and time off, employee communications, performance management, training and skills development, and community involvement. The college prioritizes flexibility and self-care for its employees.
